attributes.action: Referendum of the British People on European Union membership and our financial support of the Euro.
attributes.additional_details:
EU membership is eroding at an ever increasing rate the power of the UK parliament to govern this country. The financial crisis within the Euro zone and the suggested solutions will increase dramatically the EU`s influence on our daily lives including how we organise and manage our welfare state, our taxation levels ( europe is demanding ever increasing levels of contributions), how we manage our prison population etc etc.
Sign this petition if you want a referendum on our EU membership AND if you think our financial support of the Euro should be voted on in a referendum.
